Lindero Country Club.knownFor: “ Small par 3 course, easily walked ” Reviewed August 29, 2015 via mobile This is a nice place to go to get some exercise and not have to spend hours golfing. You can walk this course pretty easily, as it meanders through the local neighborhood. I actually took three clubs, a 6 and 9 iron and a putter and they handled the course just fine.
